name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.http.authentication.token.validity
description:
Indicates how long (in seconds) an authentication token is valid before it has
    to be renewed.

name: mapreduce.am.max-attempts
description:
The maximum number of application attempts. It is a
  application-specific setting. It should not be larger than the global number
  set by resourcemanager. Otherwise, it will be override. The default number is
  set to 2, to allow at least one retry for AM.

name: fs.s3a.multipart.purge.age
description:
Minimum age in seconds of multipart uploads to purge
    on startup if "fs.s3a.multipart.purge" is true

name: hadoop.fuse.connection.timeout
description:
The minimum number of seconds that we'll cache libhdfs connection objects
    in fuse_dfs. Lower values will result in lower memory consumption; higher
    values may speed up access by avoiding the overhead of creating new
    connection objects.

name: dfs.namenode.blockreport.max.lock.hold.time
description: The BlockReportProcessingThread max write lock hold time in ms.

name: dfs.balancer.max-size-to-move
description:
Maximum number of bytes that can be moved by the balancer in a single
    thread.
